name: John Ramirez
blurb: I’m John, and I passed my road test on my first attempt, offcourse with the help of my instructor who is great and very knowledgeable. I am glad that I booked my lessons with Leo, he was referred to me by a friend who also said that Leo is a good instructor and great guy. I truly recommend Leo as your driving instructor and I can guarantee you what i have mentioned above, he’s great
